events.title: Frontend Future: React & Next.js Conference
events.description: A full-day conference covering the latest in React, Next.js, performance, and edge rendering.
events.location: Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET), Dhaka

events.title: Design Systems Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop building a design system with tokens, accessibility, and component libraries.

events.title: Startup Meetup: Pitch Night
events.description: Early-stage founders present 3-minute pitches to mentors and investors. Networking to follow.

events.title: Machine Learning for Developers (Webinar)
events.description: Intro to ML workflows for web developers: data pipelines, model hosting, and edge inference.

events.title: Hack the Weekend: Civic Tech Hackathon
events.description: 48-hour hackathon solving civic problems with APIs, maps, and open data. Prizes for top 3 teams.

events.title: Accessibility in UI â€” Practical Patterns
events.description: Short meetup about ARIA, keyboard flows, and testing strategies to make inclusive apps.

events.title: DevOps Day: CI/CD & Observability
events.description: A one-day track focused on modern CI/CD pipelines, feature flags, and production monitoring.

events.title: Serverless Jam Session
events.description: Bring your serverless project and get peer feedback; short lightning talks included.

events.title: Career Clinic: Resume & Interview Prep
events.description: Mock interviews and resume reviews for junior frontend and full-stack developers.

events.title: Green Tech Summit
events.description: Panel discussions on sustainable computing, energy-efficient data centers and green startups.

events.title: Product Management Fundamentals
events.description: Workshop for new PMs: user research, roadmap prioritization, and stakeholder communication.

events.title: End-of-Year Dev Social
events.description: Casual meetup to celebrate wins, swap stories, and form new collaborations. Food and drinks included.
